parameters.definition: Number of packages a regular van can deliver per day
Units of pollutants produced by a regular van per day
Number of packages a hybrid van can deliver per day
Units of pollutants produced by a hybrid van per day
Maximum allowable units of pollutants per day
Minimum number of packages needed to be delivered per day

description: A shipping company can purchase regular and hybrid vans to make deliveries. A regular van can deliver \param{PackagesRegular} packages per day and produces \param{PollutantsRegular} units of pollutants. A hybrid van can deliver \param{PackagesHybrid} packages per day and produces \param{PollutantsHybrid} units of pollutants. Due to a new environmental law, they can produce at most \param{MaxPollutants} units of pollutants per day. However, the company needs to be able to deliver at least \param{MinPackages} packages per day. How many of each type of van should they buy to minimize the total number of vans needed?
